verse.gurmukhi: Avr n GVI ibDwqw sm ijh ]7]

ss.gurmukhi: ijs vrgI ivDwqw ny hor koeI GVI nhIN hY ]7]

transliteration.english: avar na ghaRee bidhaataa sam jeh ||7||

transliteration.hi: अवर न घड़ी बिधाता सम जिह ॥७॥

transliteration.ur: اور ن گھڑیِ بدھاتا سم جه ۔۔۷۔۔

ss.gurmukhi: pihlw qUM aus nUM mYnUM imlw dy।
ss.unicode: ਪਹਿਲਾ ਤੂੰ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਮੈਨੂੰ ਮਿਲਾ ਦੇ।

verse.gurmukhi: qw pwCy mo sO piq pwvY ]

ss.gurmukhi: aus ipCoN myry vrgw pqI pRwpq kr।

transliteration.english: taa paachhe mo sau pat paavai ||

verse.gurmukhi: XO jo koit aupwv bnY hY ]

ss.gurmukhi: auWj jy qUM kroVw aupw kr leyW,

verse.gurmukhi: qO mo so nih Bogn pY hY ]8]
verse.unicode: ਤੌ ਮੋ ਸੋ ਨਹਿ ਭੋਗਨ ਪੈ ਹੈ ॥੮॥

transliteration.english: tau mo so neh bhogan pai hai ||8||

verse.gurmukhi: XO hI sKI jwie iqh khI ]

ss.gurmukhi: ausy qrRhw sKI ny jw ky aus nUM ikhw,

transliteration.english: yau hee sakhee jai teh kahee ||
transliteration.hindi: यौ ही सखी जाइ तिह कही ॥
transliteration.en: yau hee sakhee jai teh kahee ||

verse.gurmukhi: mn bc kuAir cikRq hÍY rhI ]
